name: Into the Web
description:
THE PLOT

It is the era of the Internet, computers, and technologies, but something evil is lurking underneath the surface. Humanity is doomed, and soon, there will be no human at all. You are hired by an underground organization to go into the web and to hack the way out. What you do will save all of humanity. But they are always watching...

HIGHLIGHTS

"Into the Web" is a game made for the DOS Games Jam 2020.

+ Enjoy the noisy floppy disks drive and the CRT monitor!

Experience the retro! (If you like the aesthetics...)

+ Listen to 2 synthwave soundtracks in the main menu and the end!

Here's one of them!

+ Use simple commands to achieve your objectives!

Link! Clear! Halt! Various combinations! You decide what to do.

+ Randomly generated levels!

Every time you play is different. 

AND MORE

If strategy or puzzle isn't your thing, check out AMY'S PHONE!

Check out Amy's Phone
